job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Designing and building high-quality AI automations to streamline processes, enhance productivity, and deliver robust, scalable solutions across diverse applications
     * Experimenting with state-of-the-art AI tools like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, integrating them into our developmental process to assess and enhance their utility
     * Evaluating and optimizing the implementation of AI solutions across various infrastructures, including AWS, to ensure seamless performance and integration, Architecting and deploying sophisticated, fully-automated AI systems that require zero human intervention for a truly scalable impact
job_details.full_text:
Associate Software Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

* Designing and building high-quality AI automations to streamline processes, enhance productivity, and deliver robust, scalable solutions across diverse applications
     * Experimenting with state-of-the-art AI tools like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, integrating them into our developmental process to assess and enhance their utility
     * Evaluating and optimizing the implementation of AI solutions across various infrastructures, including AWS, to ensure seamless performance and integration, Architecting and deploying sophisticated, fully-automated AI systems that require zero human intervention for a truly scalable impact

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes designing and building AI automations, integrating state-of-the-art AI tools like GPT-4 Vision, and deploying automated AI systems. This aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on generative models and their application in user-facing or process-streamlining systems.

phrases: Designing and building high-quality AI automations
Experimenting with state-of-the-art AI tools like GPT-4 Vision
integrating them into our developmental process to assess and enhance their utility
Evaluating and optimizing the implementation of AI solutions
Architecting and deploying sophisticated, fully-automated AI systems
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the core work of developing, integrating, and optimizing AI models and solutions, which falls under the Modeling task category, particularly with the mention of generative AI tools.

phrases: building high-quality AI automations to streamline processes, enhance productivity, and deliver robust, scalable solutions across diverse applications
integrating them into our developmental process
implementing AI solutions across various infrastructures
job_tasks.justification: The description focuses on building, integrating, and deploying AI solutions into applications and systems, which are key aspects of software development, especially when building user-facing or process-enhancing applications.

phrases: optimizing the implementation of AI solutions across various infrastructures
fully-automated AI systems that require zero human intervention for a truly scalable impact
job_tasks.justification: Phrases related to scalability, performance, integration, and automated deployment point towards the operational aspects of ensuring AI systems run smoothly in production environments.
This phrase indicates an understanding of how AI solutions are intended to benefit the business by improving efficiency and productivity.

soft_skills.phrase: Architecting and deploying sophisticated, fully-automated AI systems that require zero human intervention for a truly scalable impact
